# Hello!

I'm Eli Mizrachi ("miz-rah-chee"). I use `they` or `she` pronouns. I'm currently a postdoc working with Dr. Maria Elena Monzani at SLAC on the LZ dark matter search experiment. 

You can find my dissertation [here](https://emiz.gitlab.io/thesis_public/) and see my CV for more information.

## Interests

* Cool science hardware, i.e. high-purity, high-vacuum, cryogenic gas systems.
* Particle physics
* Sustainable software development and documentation
* Data engineering
* [*Tikkun olam*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tikkun_olam)
